item.description:
Let us all girls get together and have some fun this Thursday! The place is the Living Room and the appetizers are half-priced on weekdays 4-7pm. So, if we could meet around 5.30, we will have ample time to place the order. But if you cannot make it before 7, don't worry you could still come! You could also check out the website for more information.

http://thelivingroomb...


For directions, check out the link below:

http://thelivingroomb...

Parking could be expensive, so if you have an option of taking the T, you may wanna do that.

Looking forward to seeing you all!
item.name: Girls night out!!
